evaluate.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to judge how good, useful, or successful something is
evaluate.translation[0].definitions[0].e: You should be able to evaluate your own work.
We need to evaluate the success of the campaign.
It can be difficult to evaluate the effectiveness of different treatments.
evaluate.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to carefully consider something to see how useful or valuable it is
evaluate.translation[1].definitions[0].e: We need to evaluate the success of our last marketing campaign.
